00052 typedef map<string, string>::iterator mapSSIter_t;
00053 typedef map<string, int>::iterator mapSIIter_t;
00054 typedef const vector<string>::iterator cvecSIter_t;
00055 typedef const vector<string>::const_iterator cvecSCIter_t;

00057 std::string 
00058 MidasFileRoot(const std::string& str)
00059 {
00060   //const std::string unixSeparator = "/";
00061   //const std::string windowsSeparator = "\\";
00062   std::string::size_type pos = 0;
00063   pos = str.rfind (Fs::pathSep());
00064   if (pos != std::string::npos)
00065     // return root based on unix separators if any were found
00066     return str.substr (pos+1);
00067   
00068   pos = str.rfind (Fs::osPathSep());
00069   if (pos != std::string::npos)
00070     // else return root based on windows separators if any were found
00071     return str.substr (pos+1);
00072   
00073   // return full name if no separators were found
00074   return str;
00075 }

00078 /**
00079  * @brief Constructor.
00080  *
00081  * Copy input file names, output directory name, flags,
00082  * and log stabilization factor to local storage.
00083  * option checks.
00084  *
00085  * @param celsFileName Cels file name.
00086  * @param geneDataFileName Gene data file name.
00087  * @param exonDataFileName Exon data file name.
00088  * @param metaFileName meta probeset file name.
00089  * @param wantPvalues Caller requests p values.
00090  * @param wantFstats Caller requests F statistics.
00091  * @param wantNormalized Caller requests normalized exon signal.
00092  * @param logStabilize Amount to add to data before taking logarithm.
00093  * @param commandLine Copy of the command line, for output tag.
00094  * @param execVersion Version, cvs id string.
00095  * @param noLogTransform Do not log transform data.
00096  * @param keepPath Keep cel file path.
00097  *
00098  *  Errors: exception if no output chosen
00099  */
00100 midasConfigureRun::midasConfigureRun (std::string celsFileName, std::string geneDataFileName,
00101                                       std::string exonDataFileName, std::string metaFileName, 
00102                                       std::string outputDirectory, const bool wantPvalues, 
00103                                       const bool wantFstats, const bool wantNormalized,
00104                                       const float& logStabilize, const std::string& commandLine,
00105                                       const std::string& execVersion,const bool noLogTransform,
00106                                       const bool keepPath)
00107     : celsFileName (celsFileName), geneDataFileName (geneDataFileName),
00108       exonDataFileName (exonDataFileName),
00109       metaFileName (metaFileName), outputDirectory (outputDirectory),
00110       wantPvalues (wantPvalues), wantFstats (wantFstats), wantNormalized (wantNormalized),
00111       logStabilize (logStabilize), commandLine (commandLine), noLogTransform (noLogTransform),
00112       comment ("############################################################"),
00113       execVersion (execVersion), keepPath (keepPath)
00114 {
00115   // require at least one output option
00116   if (! wantPvalues && ! wantFstats && ! wantNormalized)
00117     Err::errAbort("At least one output option must be selected");
00118   // no warning yet
00119   pWarningMessage = 0;
00120 
00121   // initialize vector of tags to propagate from gene, exon data files
00122   const string dataFileTagsIn[] = { "guid", "chip_type", "lib_set_name", "lib_set_version" };
00123   const int dataSize = sizeof (dataFileTagsIn) / sizeof (dataFileTagsIn[0]);
00124   const vector<string> dataFileTagsString (dataFileTagsIn, dataFileTagsIn + dataSize);
00125   dataFileTags = dataFileTagsString;
00126 
00127   //
00128   groupIdMax=0;
00129   groupIdsUsed=0;
00130 }

00132 // validate meta probeset file - must contain probeset_id, probeset_list columns
00133 void midasConfigureRun::checkMetaFile()
00134 {
00135   if (metaTsv.open(metaFileName)!=TSV_OK) {
00136       Err::errAbort("Open failed: "+string(metaFileName));
00137   }
00138   // gotta have probeset_id and probeset_list
00139   if (metaTsv.cname2cidx(0,PROBESET_ID)<0) {
00140       Err::errAbort("No '" PROBESET_ID "' in '"+string(metaFileName)+"'");
00141   }
00142   if (metaTsv.cname2cidx(0,PROBESET_LIST)<0) {
00143       Err::errAbort("No '" PROBESET_LIST "' in '"+string (metaFileName)+"'");
00144   }
00145   // finished with the meta file
00146   metaTsv.close();
00147   
00148   // propagate all tags, prepend 
00149   propagateMetaTags(metatagBucketTsv,"meta_probeset_",metaTsv);
00150 }

00152 // read cels.txt file, generate map between cel_files name and group_id string
00153 void midasConfigureRun::readCelsFile()
00154 {
00155 #ifdef WIN32
00156   celsTsv.m_optEscapeOk = false;
00157 #endif
00158 
00159   std::string cel_file_str;
00160   std::string group_id_str;
00161 
00162   celsTsv.bind(0, "cel_files", &cel_file_str, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00163   celsTsv.bind(0, "group_id", &group_id_str, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00164 
00165   //printf("\nopen: celsFileName: %s\n",celsFileName.c_str());
00166   if (celsTsv.open(celsFileName)!=TSV_OK) {
00167       Err::errAbort(celsFileName);
00168   }
00169 
00170   //
00171   //celsTsv.dump();
00172 
00173   int row=0;
00174 
00175   //
00176   while (celsTsv.nextLevel(0)==TSV_OK) {
00177     /// @todo  This adds a "C:"
00178     if (!keepPath) {
00179       cel_file_str=MidasFileRoot(cel_file_str);
00180     }
00181     //
00182     if (!celFileGroupIdStringMap.insert(make_pair(cel_file_str,group_id_str)).second) {
00183       string msg = "Duplicate cel_files entry in '"+string(celsFileName)+"' at row "+ToStr(row);
00184       msg += ": " + cel_file_str + ", " + group_id_str;
00185       Err::errAbort(msg);
00186     }
00187     row++;
00188   }
00189   celsTsv.close();
00190 
00191   //
00192   propagateMetaTags(metatagBucketTsv,"cel_group_",celsTsv);
00193 }

00196 // Allocate a groupId for the string.
00197 // Remember to set groupIdMax=0.
00198 int
00199 midasConfigureRun::allocGroupId(std::string groupIdStr)
00200 {
00201   int groupId;
00202 
00203   map<string,int>::iterator i;
00204   i=groupIdStringToIntMap.find(groupIdStr);
00205   if (i==groupIdStringToIntMap.end()) {
00206     groupId=groupIdMax;
00207     // printf("allocGroupId: g_str='%s' g_id=%d\n",groupIdStr.c_str(),groupIdMax); //dbg
00208     groupIdStringToIntMap.insert(make_pair(groupIdStr,groupIdMax));
00209     groupIdMax++;
00210   } else {
00211     groupId=(*i).second;
00212   }
00213   return groupId;
00214 }
00215 
00216 // read genedata file - for each cel_file name found in both the genedata.txt and
00217 // cels.txt files, assign an (int) group_id index, write the cel_file name to
00218 // the geneDataCelFiles vector and the (int) group_id index to the groupId Ints
00219 // vector.  celFilesUsed is the size of both of these vectors.
00220 void midasConfigureRun::readGeneDataFile()
00221 {
00222   int groupIdInt;
00223   string groupIdStr;
00224   string celFile;
00225 
00226   if (geneDataTsv.open(geneDataFileName)!=TSV_OK) {
00227       Err::errAbort(geneDataFileName);
00228   }
00229   // have to have "probeset_id" as 0th column
00230   if (geneDataTsv.cname2cidx(0,PROBESET_ID)<0) {
00231       Err::errAbort("No probeset_id");
00232   }
00233   // backquotes "\" are allowed as windows seps -- they arent escape chars.
00234   geneDataTsv.m_optEscapeOk=false;
00235 
00236   //
00237   int colcnt=geneDataTsv.getColumnCount(0);
00238   
00239   for (int col=1;col<colcnt;col++) {
00240     geneDataTsv.cidx2cname(0,col,celFile);
00241 
00242     if (!keepPath) {
00243       celFile=MidasFileRoot(celFile);
00244     }
00245 
00246     // printf("col=%4d %s\n",col,celFile.c_str()); //dbg
00247     std::map<std::string,std::string>::iterator cfi;
00248     cfi=celFileGroupIdStringMap.find(celFile);
00249     if (cfi==celFileGroupIdStringMap.end()) {
00250       // printf("continue\n");
00251       continue;
00252     }
00253     groupIdInt=allocGroupId(cfi->second);
00254     celFileGroupIdIntMap.insert(make_pair(celFile,groupIdInt));
00255 
00256     // append this cel_file name and group_id int to the appropriate vectors
00257     geneDataCelFiles.push_back(celFile);
00258     groupIdInts.push_back(groupIdInt);
00259     ++celFilesUsedInGeneData;
00260     ++groupIdsUsed;
00261   }
00262   // done with the file
00263   geneDataTsv.close();
00264 
00265   //
00266   propagateMetaTags(metatagBucketTsv,"gene_summary_",geneDataTsv);
00267 
00268   // Check for vaild inputs
00269   if (groupIdsUsed<2)  {
00270       Err::errAbort("Need more than 2 groups; "+ToStr(groupIdMax)+" given.");
00271   }
00272   if (celFilesUsedInGeneData==groupIdMax) {
00273       Err::errAbort("need at least one group with more than one data column.");
00274   }
00275 
00276   //printf("groupIdMax=%d   celFilesUsed=%d\n",groupIdMax,celFilesUsedInGeneData); //dbg
00277 }
00278 
00279 // read exon data file header - here we're only validating that the list
00280 // of cel_file names matches those found in the gene data file
00281 void midasConfigureRun::readExonDataFile()
00282 {
00283   // there?
00284   if (exonDataTsv.open(exonDataFileName)!=TSV_OK) {
00285       Err::errAbort("Cant open '"+string(exonDataFileName)+"'");    
00286   }
00287   // correct header?
00288   if (exonDataTsv.cname2cidx(0,PROBESET_ID)<0) {
00289       Err::errAbort("'" PROBESET_ID "' not found in '"+string(exonDataFileName)+"'");
00290   }
00291   exonDataTsv.m_optEscapeOk=false;
00292 
00293   // count of cel_files used (data columns)
00294   int celFilesUsedInExonData = 0;
00295   
00296   string colname;
00297   string msg;
00298   int cidx;
00299   string celFile;
00300   
00301   // First column must be PROBESET_ID
00302   exonDataTsv.cidx2cname(0,0,colname);
00303   if (colname!=PROBESET_ID) {
00304     msg="zeroth column is " + colname + " not " PROBESET_ID;
00305     Err::errAbort(msg);
00306   }
00307 
00308   int exonColumns=exonDataTsv.getColumnCount(0);
00309 
00310   std::map<int,int> groupIdsUsedMap;
00311   mapSSIter_t celFileGroupIdStringIter;
00312   mapSIIter_t celFileGroupIdIntIter;
00313   //mapSSIter_t celFileIter;
00314 
00315   while (exonDataTsv.nextLevel(0)==affx::TSV_OK) {
00316     for (cidx=1;cidx<exonColumns;cidx++) {
00317       exonDataTsv.cidx2cname(0,cidx,celFile);
00318       // check if the exon data column name is a cel_file name in cels.txt
00319       celFileGroupIdStringIter.operator = (celFileGroupIdStringMap.find(celFile));
00320       // if a cel_file name is found in both the cels.txt and exon data files
00321       // but not the genedata file, warn the user and continue without it
00322       celFileGroupIdIntIter = celFileGroupIdIntMap.find(celFile);
00323       if (celFileGroupIdIntIter == celFileGroupIdIntMap.end()) {
00324         string msg = "Warning: cel_file name " + celFile +
00325           " is found in the " + string (exonDataFileName) +
00326           " file but not in the " + string (geneDataFileName) + " file";
00327         addWarning (msg);
00328         continue;
00329       }
00330 
00331       groupIdsUsedMap[celFileGroupIdIntIter->second]=1;
00332       ++celFilesUsedInExonData;
00333     }
00334   }
00335   // check if any cel_file name was found in the genedata file, not in the exon data file
00336   if (celFilesUsedInGeneData != celFilesUsedInExonData) {
00337     // if a cel_file name has been found in genedata file but not the exon data file,
00338     // warn the user, delete the file name from the geneDataCelFiles vector and
00339     // the group index from the groupIdInts vector
00340     const size_t geneDataCelFilesCount = geneDataCelFiles.size();
00341     msg="";
00342     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < geneDataCelFilesCount; ++i) {
00343       // check each cel_file name already found in the genedata file
00344       if (exonDataTsv.cname2cidx(0,geneDataCelFiles[i])<0) {
00345         msg+=geneDataCelFiles[i]+" ";
00346       }
00347     }
00348     if (msg!="") {
00349       msg=string("Warning: mismatch between cel_files in genedata, exon data files.\n"
00350                  "The following cel_files were found in the genedata file, not in the exon data file:\n")
00351         +msg+string("\n");
00352       addWarning(msg);
00353     }
00354   }
00355 
00356   // 
00357   groupIdsUsed=groupIdsUsedMap.size();
00358 
00359   // need to recheck if too few groups or data columns remain
00360   if (groupIdsUsed < 2) {
00361       msg = ToStr (groupIdsUsed) + " experimental group(s) identified; need at least two to process.\n";
00362       Err::errAbort(msg);
00363   }
00364   // @todo: add this back in
00365   if (celFilesUsedInGeneData == groupIdsUsed) {
00366     msg = "Unable to process this data - need at least one group with more than one data column.\n";
00367     Err::errAbort(msg);
00368   }
00369   
00370   // all done
00371   exonDataTsv.close();
00372   metatagBucketTsv.addHeader("exon_summary_filename",exonDataFileName);
00373   propagateMetaTags(metatagBucketTsv,"exon_summary_",exonDataTsv);
00374 }

00376 void
00377 midasConfigureRun::addMetaTags(affx::TsvFile& tsvfile)
00378 {
00379   tsvfile.addHeader("guid",affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00380   tsvfile.addHeader("exec_guid",execGuid);
00381   tsvfile.addHeader("exec_version",execVersion);
00382   tsvfile.addHeader("create_date",timeString);
00383   tsvfile.addHeader("cmd=",commandLine);
00384   tsvfile.addHeaderComment("###################");
00385 }

00389 // If no warning message is already present, generate a new one
00390 // else concatenate the input message to the existing message.
00391 void midasConfigureRun::addWarning (const std::string& message)
00392 {
00393   // cout << "warning: " << message << "\n"; // dbg
00394 
00395   if (! pWarningMessage)
00396     pWarningMessage = new string (message);
00397   else
00398     *pWarningMessage += "\n" + message;
00399 }

00401 void
00402 midasConfigureRun::throwIfFileExists(std::string fileName)
00403 {
00404   ifstream inFstream;
00405   string msg;
00406 
00407   inFstream.open (fileName.c_str(), ios_base::in);
00408   if (!inFstream.fail()) {
00409     msg = "Output file " + fileName + " already exists.  Please rename or delete it.";
00410     Err::errAbort(msg);
00411   }
00412 }

00414 // Call Err::errAbort on any error condition.
00415 // Return pointer to non-fatal warning message, if any
00416 std::string* 
00417 midasConfigureRun::configure ()
00418 {
00419   // check if requested output files already exist
00420   string outDirString (outputDirectory);
00421   if (outDirString == "")
00422     outDirString = ".";
00423 
00424   // open for input - abort if output file already exists
00425   if (wantPvalues) {
00426     pvaluesFileName = Fs::join(outDirString,PVALUES_OUTPUT);
00427     throwIfFileExists(pvaluesFileName);
00428   }
00429   if (wantFstats) {
00430     fstatsFileName = Fs::join(outDirString,FSTATS_OUTPUT);
00431     throwIfFileExists(pvaluesFileName);
00432   }
00433   if (wantNormalized) {
00434     normalizedFileName = Fs::join(outDirString,NORMALIZED_OUTPUT);
00435     throwIfFileExists(pvaluesFileName);
00436   }
00437 
00438   // validate meta probeset file
00439   checkMetaFile();
00440 
00441   // build map from cel_file name to group_id string
00442   readCelsFile();
00443 
00444   celFilesUsedInGeneData = 0;
00445   groupIdsUsed = 0;
00446 
00447   // read, validate genedata file
00448    readGeneDataFile();
00449 
00450   // read, validate exon data file
00451   readExonDataFile();
00452 
00453   //const unsigned int numGroups = geneDataCelFiles.size();
00454 
00455   //
00456   execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00457 
00458   // set up headers for requested outputs
00459   timeString=Util::getTimeStamp();
00460 
00461   return pWarningMessage;
00462 }
00463 
00464 void
00465 midasConfigureRun::propagateMetaTags(TsvFile& destTsv,std::string prefix,TsvFile& srcTsv)
00466 {
00467   destTsv.addHeadersFrom(srcTsv,prefix,TSV_ADD_KEYS);
00468   destTsv.addHeaderComment("###################");
00469 }

00471 void 
00472 midasConfigureRun::deleteOutputs_1(bool want,std::string filename)
00473 {
00474   if (wantPvalues&&(filename!="")) {
00475     unlink(filename.c_str());
00476   }
00477 }

00479 // Delete output files - close if open
00480 void midasConfigureRun::deleteOutputs()
00481 {
00482   deleteOutputs_1(wantPvalues   ,pvaluesFileName   );
00483   deleteOutputs_1(wantFstats    ,fstatsFileName    );
00484   deleteOutputs_1(wantNormalized,normalizedFileName);
00485  }
00486 
00487 // Construct, run the midas engine
00488 // Engine calls Err::errAbort on any error condition.
00489 void midasConfigureRun::run()
00490 {
00491   // the engine object constructor requires user input file names, cel_file and group_id (int) lists,
00492   // output file names, flags, and log stabilization factor
00493   midasEngine engine (geneDataCelFiles, groupIdInts, metaFileName, geneDataFileName, exonDataFileName,
00494         pvaluesFileName.c_str(), fstatsFileName.c_str(), normalizedFileName.c_str(), wantPvalues,
00495         wantFstats, wantNormalized, logStabilize, noLogTransform);
00496   // Add metatags to the bucket...
00497   addMetaTags(metatagBucketTsv);
00498   /// @todo  why do we have to copy it to another bucket?
00499   // If the engine was made at the start we could be adding it directly.
00500   engine.metatagBucketTsv.addHeadersFrom(metatagBucketTsv,TSV_ADD_ALL);
00501   // now run 
00502   engine.analyze();
00503 }
